001package ca.gc.cra.radar.infrastructure.protocol.tn3270;
002
003import ca.gc.cra.radar.application.port.ClockPort;
004import ca.gc.cra.radar.application.port.MessageReconstructor;
005import ca.gc.cra.radar.application.port.MetricsPort;
006import ca.gc.cra.radar.infrastructure.buffer.GrowableBuffer;
007import ca.gc.cra.radar.domain.msg.MessageEvent;
008import ca.gc.cra.radar.domain.msg.MessageMetadata;
009import ca.gc.cra.radar.domain.msg.MessageType;
010import ca.gc.cra.radar.domain.msg.TransactionId;
011import ca.gc.cra.radar.domain.net.ByteStream;
012import ca.gc.cra.radar.domain.net.FiveTuple;
013import ca.gc.cra.radar.domain.protocol.ProtocolId;
014import java.util.ArrayDeque;
015import java.util.ArrayList;
016import java.util.Deque;
017import java.util.List;
018import java.util.Map;
019
020/**
021 * Reconstructs TN3270 Telnet records into high-level message events.
022 * <p>Handles host-first message ordering and Telnet negotiations. Not thread-safe.</p>
023 *
024 * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
025 */
026public final class Tn3270MessageReconstructor implements MessageReconstructor {
027  private final ClockPort clock;
028  private final Tn3270Metrics metrics;
029
030  private DirectionState client;
031  private DirectionState server;
032  private final Deque<String> pendingTransactionIds = new ArrayDeque<>();
033
034  /**
035   * Creates a reconstructor bound to the supplied clock and metrics sink.
036   *
037   * @param clock clock used for timestamping generated events
038   * @param metrics metrics sink used to record TN3270 reconstruction statistics
039   * @throws NullPointerException if {@code clock} or {@code metrics} is {@code null}
040   * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
041   */
042  public Tn3270MessageReconstructor(ClockPort clock, MetricsPort metrics) {
043    this.clock = clock;
044    this.metrics = new Tn3270Metrics(metrics);
045  }
046
047  /**
048   * Initializes per-direction decoders and clears pending transactions.
049   *
050   * @implNote Resets Telnet decoders for client and server directions.
051   * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
052   */
053  @Override
054  public void onStart() {
055    client = new DirectionState(true);
056    server = new DirectionState(false);
057    pendingTransactionIds.clear();
058  }
059
060  /**
061   * Decodes incoming bytes into Telnet records and produces TN3270 message events.
062   *
063   * @param slice contiguous TCP bytes with orientation metadata; must not be {@code null}
064   * @return ordered list of reconstructed TN3270 messages; may be empty
065   * @throws NullPointerException if {@code slice} is {@code null}
066   * @implNote Splits Telnet records on IAC EOR boundaries and manages host-first transaction ids.
067   * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
068   */
069  @Override
070  public List<MessageEvent> onBytes(ByteStream slice) {
071    metrics.onBytes(slice.data().length);
072    DirectionState dir = slice.fromClient() ? client : server;
073
074    List<byte[]> records = dir.feed(slice.data(), 0, slice.data().length);
075    List<MessageEvent> events = new ArrayList<>(records.size());
076    for (byte[] record : records) {
077      boolean fromClient = slice.fromClient();
078      MessageType type = fromClient ? MessageType.REQUEST : MessageType.RESPONSE;
079      String transactionId;
080      if (!fromClient) {
081        transactionId = TransactionId.newId();
082        pendingTransactionIds.addLast(transactionId);
083      } else {
084        transactionId = pendingTransactionIds.isEmpty()
085            ? TransactionId.newId()
086            : pendingTransactionIds.removeFirst();
087      }
088      ByteStream stream = new ByteStream(slice.flow(), fromClient, record, slice.timestampMicros());
089      MessageMetadata metadata = new MessageMetadata(transactionId, Map.of());
090      events.add(new MessageEvent(ProtocolId.TN3270, type, stream, metadata));
091    }
092    return events;
093  }
094
095  /**
096   * Releases buffered state and clears pending transaction ids.
097   *
098   * @implNote Flushes Telnet decoder buffers to avoid cross-session leakage.
099   * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
100   */
101  @Override
102  public void onClose() {
103    pendingTransactionIds.clear();
104    client.reset();
105    server.reset();
106  }
107
108  private static final class DirectionState {
109    private final boolean fromClient;
110    private final TelnetRecordDecoder decoder = new TelnetRecordDecoder();
111
112    DirectionState(boolean fromClient) {
113      this.fromClient = fromClient;
114    }
115
116    List<byte[]> feed(byte[] data, int off, int len) {
117      return decoder.feed(data, off, len);
118    }
119
120    void reset() {
121      decoder.reset();
122    }
123  }
124
125  private static final class TelnetRecordDecoder {
126    private static final int IAC = 0xFF;
127    private static final int SB = 0xFA;
128    private static final int SE = 0xF0;
129    private static final int EOR = 0xEF;
130    private static final int WILL = 0xFB;
131    private static final int WONT = 0xFC;
132    private static final int DO = 0xFD;
133    private static final int DONT = 0xFE;
134
135    private final GrowableBuffer record = new GrowableBuffer(1024);
136    private boolean pendingIac = false;
137    private boolean inSubneg = false;
138    private int awaitingOptionCmd = 0;
139
140    List<byte[]> feed(byte[] data, int off, int len) {
141      List<byte[]> out = null;
142      for (int i = 0; i < len; i++) {
143        int b = data[off + i] & 0xFF;
144        if (awaitingOptionCmd != 0) {
145          awaitingOptionCmd = 0;
146          continue;
147        }
148        if (!pendingIac) {
149          if (b == IAC) {
150            pendingIac = true;
151            continue;
152          }
153          if (!inSubneg) {
154            record.writeByte((byte) b);
155          }
156          continue;
157        }
158        pendingIac = false;
159        switch (b) {
160          case IAC -> record.writeByte((byte) IAC);
161          case SB -> inSubneg = true;
162          case SE -> inSubneg = false;
163          case WILL, WONT, DO, DONT -> awaitingOptionCmd = b;
164          case EOR -> {
165            if (record.readableBytes() > 0) {
166              if (out == null) out = new ArrayList<>();
167              out.add(record.copyAll());
168            }
169          }
170          default -> { /* ignore */ }
171        }
172      }
173      return out == null ? List.of() : out;
174    }
175
176    void reset() {
177      record.clear();
178      pendingIac = false;
179      inSubneg = false;
180      awaitingOptionCmd = 0;
181    }
182
183  }
184
185}
186
187
